name: Tab and Tab Group Shortcuts
description: Adds shortcuts for creating tabs, reorganizing tabs, and moving the focus.

swap-right-skipping-tab-groups.description: Swap tab to the right, skipping tab groups

swap-left-skipping-tab-groups.description: Swap tab to the left, skipping tab groups

focus-left-into-group.description: Move focus left into tab group

focus-right-into-group.description: Move focus right into tab group

focus-to-next-group-or-tab-right.description: Move focus to next tab group or tab on the right, collapsing current tab group

focus-to-next-group-or-tab-left.description: Move focus to next tab group or tab on the left, collapsing current tab group

swap-group-right.description: Swap tab group to the right

swap-group-left.description: Swap tab group to the left
